data.comment: The match has started.
Lyon push forward at Groupama Stadium and Tino Kadewere gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Brestois defence.
In the minute 2, Goal kick for Brestois at Groupama Stadium.
Throw-in for Brestois in the half of Lyon.
Brestois's Cristian Battocchio breaks free at Groupama Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 3, Ball goes out of play for a Lyon goal kick.
Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brestois's half?
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
In the minute 6, Throw-in Lyon.
Jerome Brisard awards Brestois a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Lyon in Lyon.
In the minute 7, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Brestois at Groupama Stadium.
Jerome Brisard awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 11, Karl Toko Ekambi for Lyon drives towards goal at Groupama Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
Jerome Brisard signals a Lyon throw-in in Brestois's half.
In the minute 13, Brestois needs to be cautious. Lyon have an attacking throw-in.
Brestois awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Brestois in their own half.
In the minute 15, Mattia De Sciglio is booked for the home team.
Lyon's Tino Kadewere gets in a shot on goal at Groupama Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Lyon.
Lyon have a goal kick.
Lyon pushes forward through Moussa Dembele, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 20, Lyon to take a throw-in in Brestois territory.
Ball safe as Brestois is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jerome Brisard awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 25, Lyon to take a throw-in in Brestois territory.
Brestois are in shooting range from this free kick.
Brestois awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, Tino Kadewere of Lyon gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lyon.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
In the minute 31, Lyon surge into the attack at Groupama Stadium but Marceloâ€™s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Brestois at Groupama Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lyon.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
Throw-in for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
In the minute 38, Brestois awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
Brestois take a 0-1 lead thanks to Anthony Lopes.
In the minute 41, Jerome Brisard awards Brestois a goal kick.
Throw-in for Brestois in the half of Lyon.
Throw-in Lyon.
In the minute 43, Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
Important block from the Brestois defence as Tino Kadewere fires in a strike for Lyon.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Lyon.
Throw-in for Lyon close to the penalty box.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
In the minute 45, Lyon's Maxence Caqueret gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Brestois have a goal kick.
The first half has been concluded at Groupama Stadium.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Groupama Stadium.
Brestois awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 49, Corner awarded to Lyon.
In Lyon, Hiang`a Mbock of Brestois is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Brestois.
In the minute 51, Free kick Lyon.
Jerome Brisard signals a Brestois throw-in in Lyon's half.
The home team have replaced Mattia De Sciglio with Maxwel Cornet. This is the first substitution made today by Rudi Garcia.
In the minute 55, Lucas Paqueta is replacing Maxence Caqueret for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
Rudi Garcia is making the team's third substitution at Groupama Stadium with Memphis Depay replacing Karl Toko Ekambi.
Memphis Depay of Lyon smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 57, Lyon have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
Lyon's Tino Kadewere is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
In the minute 58, Lyon drive into the zone and Leo Dubois is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Ball goes out of play for a Brestois goal kick.
Memphis Depay (Lyon) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 60, Lyon have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brestois's half?
In the minute 62, Lyon to take a throw-in in Brestois territory.
Brestois are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Oliver Dall'Oglio (Brestois) is making a first substitution, with Romain Faivre replacing Romain Philippoteaux.
In the minute 64, The away team replace Franck Honorat with Irvin Cardona.
Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Brestois.
Lyon's Memphis Depay gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Brestois defender.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Brestois.
Brestois have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 68, An attacking Lyon player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Memphis Depay scores from the spot and Lyon draw level at Groupama Stadium.
Throw-in for Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 71, Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Brestois.
Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
The match at Groupama Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Tino Kadewere, who is down injured.
In the minute 74, Paul Lasne (Brestois) sees red and is sent off in Lyon!
Tino Kadewere is back on his feet again.
In Lyon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 77, Can Lyon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Brestois's half?
In Lyon Lyon drive forward through Memphis Depay. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Brestois awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, Rayan Cherki is on a sub for Moussa Dembele for Lyon.
Jerome Brisard waits before resuming play because Gautier Larsonneur for Brestois is still down.
Gautier Larsonneur for Brestois is back on the field again.
In the minute 80, Bruno Guimaraes for Lyon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Jerome Brisard awards Brestois a goal kick.
Goal! Maxwel Cornet gives Lyon a 2-1 lead.
In the minute 82, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
At Groupama Stadium, Lyon are penalized for being offside.
Lyon make their fifth substitution with Sinaly Diomande replacing Bruno Guimaraes.
In the minute 83, Oliver Dall'Oglio (Brestois) is making a third substitution, with Steve Mounie replacing Gaetan Charbonnier.
Oliver Dall'Oglio is making the team's fourth substitution at Groupama Stadium with Romain Perraud replacing Ludovic Baal.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as Lyon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 87, Brestois have been awarded a penalty in Lyon...
Brestois have been given a penalty at Groupama Stadium...
Jerome Brisard signals a Lyon throw-in in Brestois's half.
7 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Lyon have a goal kick.
Lyon drives forward and Maxwel Cornet gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Lyon in the half of Brestois.
The match has come to a close in Lyon. The final score is 2-2.
Anthony Lopes (Lyon) has received a first yellow card.
Hugo Magnetti is replacing Cristian Battocchio for the away team.
The match is now all square at 2-2 thanks to a penalty from Romain Faivre.
